1850 Pickens (Oconee)
-------
15 Apr 1880 Capt Samuel Busclark d near Walhallah Monday last in the 79th year
of his age. He had lived in the same place for nearly 50 years. Was well
known by many (Keowee Courier p 150 Lucas)

62. James HENDERSON

ONE SET OF NOTES THAT REBECCA EDWARDS MARRIED JAMES HENDERSON FROM MG AND DEATH
NOTICES FORM UPPER SC NEWEPAPERS BY HOLCOMBE

CLEMENS LISTS MARRIAGE 1 FEB 1859 TO WID SARAH HENDERSON

problem in these two marriages: all three were living in 1850 and divorce was
uncommon. ie.
1. Sarah Lindley Henderson was living
in household of Richard and Barbara Henderson in Household # 1224 in 1850.
2. James Henderson and wife Arbella were living in household 1484 in 1850.
3. Since James and Arbella are living next door to Elizabeth Coker I would
guess that he may actually be the son of Charles.
=========
James & Arbella family 1484 in 1850 Laurens Census.
=======

Arabelle (or Campbell) COKER

listed as wife of James in 1850 census. I have thought that possibly we are
dealing with 2 different James since this one lived next door to possible
sister Elizabeth Coker in 1850. ie. one son of John and one son of Charles.
1850

216. Mary HENDERSON

1860 Laurens

Sarah LINDLEY

BEE BRYANT NOTES
Should not be confused with Sarah Davenport Henderson Fowler 8087
This SARAH WAS LIVING WITH RICHARD AND BARBARA IN 1850 CENSUS.
